Description: Description ■Description Thank you very much for visiting my listing page. It is a used article of the end model of "Edwards" production of the brand in Japan which the ESP produces. There are fine scratches, but overall it is in very good condition. [Feature] ●Body：Mahogany ●Neck：Mahogany ●Scale：628mm (24 3/4inch) ●Joint：Set-Neck-body ●Pickup：(Neck) Seymour Duncan SP90-1n、(Bridge) Seymour Duncan SP90-1b ●Control：Neck Volume&Tone, Bridge Volume&Tone, Toggle PU Selector ●Bridge: Bar Type [State] ◎ neck truss rod: You have to adjust the neck, truss rod also has worked. ◎ assembly: It is output without check is also a problem of each control. ◎ fret: The remaining frets are about 70-80%. 【Accessories】 ・No accessories. In order to adjust an item after a successful bid, time will be obtained by the time it ships. I am experienced in guitar maker service. The setup of a guitar base should feel easy in order to be its favorite. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions. Shipping ■Shipping ・I can ship to worldwide. ・I am sorry to inform you, but I don’t ship to any other addresses other than your eBay registered address. ・I am happy to combine shipping for multiple purchases. ・Please allow me up to 3 business days to ship out the item upon the end of listing. ・I can assure you that I will pack the item carefully to avoid any damages during the transit. ＞ECONOMY Shipping by SAL（No Tracking Number） ＞STANDARD Shipping by e-packet（With Tracking Number） ＞EXPEDITED Shipping by EMS（With Tracking Number） ■Terms of Sale ・I can accept return within 30 days after you receive it. ・Please make sure to contact me first if you want to return it to me. ・It is buyer’s responsibility for the return shipping cost when sending back the item to me. ・I don’t accept any return without my approval and the item has to be returned in the original condition from the item you received. ・No returns on products that show any evidences of use installed/mounted/scratched etc. ■International Buyers -Please Note- ・Import duties, taxes and charges are not included in the item price or shipping charges. These charges are the buyer’s responsibility. ・Please check with your country’s customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to bidding/buying. ・These charges are normally collected by the delivering freight (shipping) company or when you pick the item up - do not confuse them for additional shipping charges. ・We do not mark merchandise values below value or mark items as “gifts” - US and International government regulations prohibit such behavior. Payment ■Payment ・I accept PayPal for the payment ONLY. ・Please make payment within 3 days after the listing ends. ・If I don’t receive your payment after 5 days from the end of the listing, I will go ahead to file an unpaid item on eBay. About Us ■About Us I am an eBay seller from Japan. I sell a lot of Japanese products. My intention is to serve you with honesty and excellent customer service. I will provide prompt and courteous service, so please purchase with confidence. Happy bidding!
Title: Excellent! Edwards by ESP Les Paul Special Guitar E-LS-115LT Blue Seymour Duncan
